document_data.name: Boyla's Court
document_data.mainbody: The '''Boyla's Court''' was a large outdoor courtyard found near the center of [[Manass]] in [[Khazari]].
document_data.Uses: The courtyard served as a prime location for a variety of events such as public announcements, executions, torturing criminals, and public festivals.
document_data.Inhabitants: The personal bodyguard of the governor of Manass kept watch along the perimeter of the courtyard.
